metadata.title: CVE-2024-9266 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: URL Redirection to Untrusted Site ('Open Redirect') vulnerability inExpress. This vulnerability affects the use of the Express Response object.This issue impacts Express: from 3.4.5 before 4.0.0.

criterions.comment: node-express package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
